definition: To express great enthusiasm or admiration for someone or something, often used when talking about a group of people sharing the same sentiment.

examples.german: Sie schwärmt von ihrem neuen Job.
examples.english: She raves about her new job.

examples.german: Die Kinder schwärmen von dem Ausflug zum Zoo.
examples.english: The children are enthusiastic about the trip to the zoo.

examples.german: Er schwärmt von seinen Reisen um die Welt.
examples.english: He raves about his travels around the world.
